items.name: Olumo Rock
items.description: A historic rock formation in Abeokuta offering panoramic views of the city, and a great spot for hiking and sightseeing.

items.name: Abeokuta National Museum
items.description: Located in the heart of Abeokuta, this museum showcases the rich cultural heritage of Ogun State.

items.name: Ogun State Cultural Centre
items.address: Ogun State Cultural Centre, Abeokuta, Ogun State
items.description: A venue for various cultural performances and events, reflecting the traditions and history of Ogun State.

items.name: Isara Waterfalls
items.description: A hidden gem in Ogun State, perfect for nature lovers and those looking to enjoy a peaceful retreat by the waterfall.

items.name: Ogun State Government Secretariat
items.description: The political hub of the state, located in Oke-Mosan, Abeokuta.

items.name: Ake Festival
items.description: A cultural event in Abeokuta celebrating the rich Yoruba heritage with traditional dances, music, and masquerades.

items.name: Ginger and Cocoa Plantations
items.description: Ogun State is known for its agricultural contributions, and these plantations showcase its growing industry.

items.name: Centenary Hall, Abeokuta
items.description: A historical building, rich in colonial-era architecture, and a prominent landmark in the city of Abeokuta.
